name: mysticticket
effect: Provides access to Navel Rock, ho oh, and lugia.
short_effect: Allows access to Navel Rock and Lugia or Ho-oh.

flavor_text.emerald: A ticket required to board the ship to NAVEL ROCK.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A ticket required to board the ship to NAVEL ROCK. It glows with a mystic light.
